Class ingen.html.character.Variable 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ingen.html.HtmlTag

           +----ingen.html.character.Variable
public class Variable
extends HtmlTag

Variable()
SUMMARY:
Creates Object equivalent of Variable ie VAR Html Tag, which direct the browser to render the text they surround in italics.

GENERATES
<VAR> and </VAR>
Variable(String, String)
SUMMARY:
Creates Object equivalent of Variable ie VAR Html Tag, which direct the browser to render the text they surround in italics.

PARAMETERS
1) String Text    :  the text to render in italics.

Variable 
 public Variable()
SUMMARY:
Creates Object equivalent of Variable ie VAR Html Tag, which direct the browser to render the text they surround in italics.

GENERATES
<VAR> and </VAR>

Variable 
 public Variable(String Text,
                 String Attribs)
SUMMARY:
Creates Object equivalent of Variable ie VAR Html Tag, which direct the browser to render the text they surround in italics.

PARAMETERS
1) String Text    :  the text to render in italics.
2) String Attribs : other attributes to be included as-is in the tag.

GENERATES
<VAR Attribs> Text </VAR>
